title: Tree Plantation Drive
description: Join us for a day of planting trees and beautifying our community. Together, we can make a difference by contributing to a greener future.

title: Clean-Up Campaign
description: Help us clean up local parks and beaches. Every little action counts in keeping our environment clean and healthy.

title: Sustainable Living Workshop
description: Learn practical tips for adopting a sustainable lifestyle. From reducing waste to eco-friendly habits, this workshop is for everyone.

title: Recycling Awareness Drive
description: An educational event focused on recycling practices. Help raise awareness about the importance of recycling and its impact on the environment.

title: Zero Waste Challenge
description: Take part in the Zero Waste Challenge! Help us spread the message of reducing waste and promoting sustainable practices in everyday life.
